tool_description: This is an api created for collect data from amazon promo codes available it update fast so no worry about anything
name: recash
title: recash

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This will filter what you want from the products on the data base

api_list.name: All products
api_list.description: This will gives you all the products with codes on the data base
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recash1.p.rapidapi.com/allproducts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recash1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://recash1.p.rapidapi.com/allproducts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recash1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
